findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations may expose parties to significant liability without recourse, especially in case of breaches or third-party claims.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability to total fees paid can be risky, as it may not cover the full extent of damages incurred by one party.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability under this Agreement is limited to the total fees paid hereunder.

findings.rationale: The absence of audit rights limits oversight, potentially allowing breaches of confidentiality to go undetected.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The automatic renewal could lead to unintended extended obligations, which may not align with the current needs of the parties.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall automatically renew for additional one-year terms unless either party provides written notice of non-renewal.

findings.rationale: The lack of intellectual property provisions may result in disputes regarding ownership and use of confidential information.
